newsitem.title: USA: Shoney's holders files suit to block changes.
newsitem.headline: Shoney's holders files suit to block changes.

text.p: Shoney's Shareholders' Committee said Monday it filed a suit to block an attempt by Shoney's Inc to invalidate the group's call for a special meeting to replace the company's board.
The suit was filed in the United States District Court for the Middle District of Tennessee.
Shoney's Shareholders' Committee is seeking, among other things, a preliminary injunction preventing the company from implementing certain bylaw amendments.
The amendements were approved June 22 after the group called for a special meeting of Shoney's shareholders to remove and replace the current Shoney's board.
The shareholder's committee's suit seeks to remove the lawsuit to the U.S. district court for the Middle District of Tennessee.

It also requests the court declare invalid the bylaw amendments and require Shoney's to make available certain documents and records relating to the identity of the beneficial owners of Shoney's stock.
